title: Toronto Man Displaying ‘Terrorist Flag’ Arrested for Public Incitement of Hatred
description: Toronto Police Service (TPS) Chief of Police Myron Demkiw speaks at the TPS monthly board meeting on Jan. 11, 2024. title: DeSantis Invites Jewish Students to Transfer to Florida
description: NEW YORK, NEW YORK - OCTOBER 30: Posters of some of those kidnapped by Hamas in Israeli are displayed on a pole outside of New York University (NYU) as tensions between supporters of Palestine and Israel increase on college campuses across the nation on October 30, 2023 in New York City. The Biden administration is announcing new actions in an attempt to crack down on antisemitic incidents on college campuses following the Hamas terror attacks on Israel. Many Jewish and Israeli students have felt threatened after large and vocal demonstrations against the fighting in Gaza broke out at numerous universities. (Photo by Spencer Platt/Getty Images)
